meanings.definition: A person who has recently started a particular job or activity.
meanings.sent1: The company welcomed the freshers with open arms.
meanings.sent2: The freshers quickly adapted to their new roles.
meanings.sent3: The freshers were eager to learn and grow in their positions.
meanings.sent4: In the office, the freshers were like sponges, absorbing all the new information.
meanings.sent5: The freshers brought a wave of enthusiasm to the workplace.

meanings.definition: A period of time at the beginning of the academic year when new students arrive at a university.
meanings.sent1: During freshers' week, the campus buzzed with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The university organized various events to welcome the freshers.
meanings.sent3: The freshers' arrival marked the start of a new chapter for the university.
meanings.sent4: Freshers' week was a whirlwind of activities and new friendships.
meanings.sent5: The freshers explored the campus with wide-eyed wonder.
